title: Christine E. Evans, “Between Truth and Time: A History of Soviet Central Television” (Yale UP, 2016)
description:
In Between Truth and Time: A History of Soviet Central Television (Yale University Press, 2016), Christine E. Evans reveals that Soviet television in the Brezhnev era was anything but boring. Whether producing music shows such as Little Blue Flame, game shows like Let’s Go Girls or dramatic mini-series, the creators...
